NewsArticle.Title: DA Patch 7.38
NewsArticle.Content: DA Version 7.38 On Wednesday, October 9th, Dark Ages will be patching to version 7.38 Patching Issues with Vista & Windows7/8: Please "right-click" your Darkages.exe icon and choose "Run as administrator" Patch notes *Updating maps for Halloween *Updating monster graphics for Halloween *Adding new items to the Itemshop
